sentences.english: Berg was sitting beside the countess, trying with filial respectfulness to reassure her.
sentences.chinese: 貝格坐在伯爵夫人身旁，愉快地恭敬地安慰着岳母。

sentences.english: 30Simon's mother-in-law was in bed with a fever, and they told Jesus about her.
sentences.chinese: 西門的岳母正害着熱病躺着，就有人告訴耶穌。

sentences.english: A big-game hunter went on safari with his wife and mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 一位職業獵人帶着妻子和岳母一塊去遊獵。

sentences.english: He was a fisherman by trade and resided at Capernaum with his wife and mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個漁夫，同他的妻子和岳母一起住在迦百農。

sentences.english: Sarah is Jenny's and Derick's mother-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉是珍妮的婆婆和德克立的岳母。

sentences.english: My mother-in-law is coming over so I have to get up early and clean the house.
sentences.chinese: 明天我岳母要過來，所以我要起早一點收拾一下家裏。

sentences.english: Vince loathed going to his mother-in-law's house.
sentences.chinese: 文斯很討厭去他岳母家。

sentences.english: A teaspoonful of my mother-in-law 's wild strawberry jam will entirely satisfy your jam desire .
sentences.chinese: 嘗一茶匙我岳母做的草萄醬就能完全滿足你的果醬欲。

sentences.english: And when Jesus was come into Peter's house, he saw his wife's mother laid, and sick of a fever.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌到了彼得家裏，見彼得的岳母害熱病躺着。

sentences.english: Therefore he called to her, asking her if she, too, would like to go prancing about like an eighteen-year-old girl.
sentences.chinese: 於是他問岳母是否也想變成個十八歲的少女跳來跳去。

sentences.english: But Simon's wife's mother lay sick of a fever, and anon they tell him of her.
sentences.chinese: 西門的岳母正在發燒躺着，他們立刻告訴耶穌。

sentences.english: My mother-in-law died of natural causes.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳母是自然死亡的。

sentences.english: We worked fit to bust to tidy the house before my mother-in-law arrived.
sentences.chinese: 在我岳母到達以前，我們竭盡全力地收拾房子。

sentences.english: “You’ve behaved like a complete shit, ” his mother-in-law said.
sentences.chinese: “你的行爲簡直像畜生，”他岳母說。

sentences.english: Family members filled with sorrow sending my Mother-In-Law to Mandai Crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 家庭成員以悲痛的心情送岳母大人到萬里焚化場。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
